amendment.description: To clarify that the requirement to remove United States Armed Forces does not apply to the provision of materials and advice intended to reduce civilian casualties or further enable adherence to the Law of Armed Conflict.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4097 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4097 proposed by Senator Cotton. (consideration: CR S7563-7654 text: CR S7564) To clarify that the requirement to remove United States Armed Forces does not apply to the provision of materials and advice intended to reduce civilian casualties or further enable adherence to the Law of Armed Conflict.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4097 proposed by Senator Cotton.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4097 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
